LanguageData.RawKiriFruits.label: kiri fruits
LanguageData.RawKiriFruits.description: The fruiting body of a subterranean slime mold... delicious, I guess?
LanguageData.RawNakatiBarks.label: nakati barks
LanguageData.RawNakatiBarks.description: The spicy bark of the Nakati plant. Usually ground up before use.
LanguageData.RawPiruFlour.label: piru flour
LanguageData.RawPiruFlour.description: Piru frond, ground down into a versatile flour-like substance. Not exactly edible.
